Package com.ojcoleman.europa.algos.neat

Contains classes that implement the NEAT evolutionary algorithm.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NEATAllele<G extends NEATGene>
    Base class for representations of NEAT alleles.
    NEATEvolver
    Implements the NEAT evolutionary algorithm.
    NEATGene
    Base class for representations of NEAT genes.
    NEATGenotype
    Genotype for the NEAT algorithm.
    NEATNeuronAddMutator
    Mutator that adds neurons to a NEAT genotype.
    NEATNeuronAllele
    Represents the mutable parameters of a neuron in a NEAT neural network.
    NEATNeuronGene
    Represents a neuron in a NEAT neural network.
    NEATRecombiner
    Implements recombination as described by the NEAT evolutionary algorithm (See https://www.cs.ucf.edu/~kstanley/neat.html) but generalised to any number of parents: if one parent dominates all others then the new genotype will inherit the genes of this parent, otherwise the genes from all parents will be inherited (except in the case where adding a synapse would result in a cycle and recurrent networks are not allowed).
    NEATSpeciator<G extends NEATGenotype,S extends Species<G>>
    Base class for Speciators for NEATGenotypes.
    NEATSpeciatorKMeans  
    NEATSpeciatorOriginal
    Implements speciation according to the original NEAT speciation method with a few difference: A target number of species may be specified with NEATSpeciatorOriginal.speciationTarget, in which case the speciation threshold will be adjusted automatically. Individuals are added to the closest matching species, not the first matching species found. It can handle alleles with multiple parameters (not just weight or bias). Parameter values may be normalised (see NEATSpeciator.normaliseParameterValues) when calculating the distance between two genomes.
    NEATSpecies  
    NEATSynapseAddMutator
    Mutator that adds synapses to a NEAT genotype.
    NEATSynapseAllele
    Represents the mutable parameters of a synapse or connection in a NEAT neural network.
    NEATSynapseGene
    Represents a synapse or connection in a NEAT neural network.
    NEATTranscriber
    Transcriber for the NEAT algorithm.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NEATSynapseAddMutator.Type  

Package com.ojcoleman.europa.algos.neat Description

Contains classes that implement the NEAT evolutionary algorithm. See https://www.cs.ucf.edu/~kstanley/neat.html
